channel.title: People cant connect to my server! Help!
channel.description: I have a server running, and other people cannot connect to it... Is it probably not anything with my DNS or something. Im thinking is either something with my computer, or something with client.java, but I have tested on another server that has worked before, and still conection error.

disable router firewall
i had 2 do that
n my fren who doesnt no his routers passowrd kant host
